Then rejoice that through Christ you have become connected with God, members of the heavenly family. While you look higher than yourself, you will have a 
                                                                           510
continual sense of the weakness of humanity. The less you cherish self, the more distinct and full will be your comprehension of the excellence of your Saviour. The more closely you connect yourself with the Source of light and power, the greater light will be shed upon you, and the greater power will be yours to work for God.--"The Desire of Ages," page 493.
